docstring: This is the perliminary data model for CRC 1333 project B06. At the current time, the data model is still under development and major changes can occur at any time. Please feel free to make changes and contribute to the project.

date.description: Date/time when the dataset was created

authors.description: Persons who worked on the dataset

subjects.description: Research subjects covered by the datset

keywords.description: Descriptive keywords to describe the dataset

samples.description: Samples used, created, or destroyed by experiments of this dataset

Dataset.docstring: This is a preliminary root container for all (meta-)data.

affiliation.description: Organisation the author is affiliated with.

email.description: Contact e-mail address of the author

phone.description: Contact phone number of the author

Author.docstring: Container for information regarding persons who worked on a dataset.

type.description: Type or scheme of personal identifier

identifier.description: String representation of the personal identifier

PersonalID.docstring: Container for personal identifiers related to an author

smiles.description: SMILES notation of the molecular structure

inchi.description: InChI encoding of the molecular structure

Sample.docstring: Generic container for samples used, created, or destroyed in experiments.

Experiment.docstring: Generic container for experiments covered by the dataset.

ExperimentType.docstring: Generic container for the different kinds of experiment.
